description.p: Please answer the questions below. Your response will not be graded, but will be available for your instructor to read. Answering these questions may also shape the discussions in class.

prompt.p: Evaluate your ability to perform each of the following tasks. In other words, how well can you do each task?
Describe the major structures of the endocrine system and their functions.
Define "hormone" and describe the three hormone types.
List the different locations for hormone receptors.
Discuss how hormone receptors maintain specificity in endocrine regulation.
Compare the hormones secreted from organs with secondary endocrine function and the primary function of these organs.
Identify how endocrine function regulates the homeostasis of different organ systems in the body.
What concept or topic is the least clear to you at this point?
Please write any other questions you would like the instructor to address in class.
